title: Cruachan Turns 50: Golden Anniversary for UK's Most Iconic Power Station (ScottishPower Ltd)
text: ( Source : ScottishPower Ltd) 15/10/ 2015 Cruachan Power Station , near Oban , celebrates its 50th anniversary today (Thursday 15th October ), marking half a century of powering Scotland's breakfasts and tea times from deep inside the mountain of
